ygData.subject: The Ramora

(Been auto-relocated back to base for being "late" in posting.  So I'm just 
going to take it as if I retreated and my forces are working on their base.

Wolfgang, I know you've got a guy outside of my base, but I'm not sure of the 
situation so I'll have to IM and get the story and then respond.)

Shockwave/Unitron/ Firestarter/Double Punch/Manterror/Injector/Vehement/Sun 
Crusher/Reflector/Sixshot/Ares/Unicron/Teufel:


Shockwave sat at the custom made throne on the bridge of the Neo Decepticon 
warship the Ramora.  The Emperor looked about an intoned to the ready Unitron 
and Firestarter.  "Unitron, go back near the remains of the CF and follow the 
so-called Megatron back to his base and meet with him and then report back.  
Have him come here so I may meet him in person, if possible."

Unitron brought his arm to his chest and then held it out in the Decepticon 
salute.  "Understood." he said, walking down the nearest corridor and heading 
for the closest way out.

Firestarter stood attentive, looking to Shockwave.  "And you, Firestarter," 
he continued in his monotonous voice, "will lead begin plans with me to 
rebuild the Ramora stronger than it is even now.  With the strength of the 
new Maximal installation, we ourselves must take up arms with a smaller yet 
easily superior base."

"Understood."

Shockwave then activated his comm. unit.  "Hell Beast, this is Shockwave.  We 
need your team to go to several areas and get all the materials and wreckage 
from the sites." He transmitted a holo-map to Hell Beast of all the areas 
(I'll IM you later JP).  "Make haste, and be on guard.  If you wish extra 
help make your way here and I'll have a few Neocons aid you."

He ended the link.  "Status of our troops, Firestarter?"

"Well, Unitron, you, Sixshot, and Ares are fully functional with only a few 
scrapes that our system repairs will take care of.  The rest will be spending 
quite a bit of time in the repair bay."

"And our allies?"

At that moment the main door to the bridge swooshed open, and the entire 
Brotherhood came out, some more damaged than others.

Unicron walked down to the center of the bridge, Shockwave's chair swerving 
to face him.  "Congratulations, Shockwave.  Your warriors fought bravely and 
quite successfully at the Cybertronian Fire, which is no more.  And from your 
most recent commands, you seem to be on top of things."

"My thanks," Shockwave intoned as his single yellow optic seemed to dim.  
"Your aid in recent times has been most appreciative and in due time your aid 
will be returned fully and even more.  Your forces are more than adequate for 
this war.  Currently I am investigating another possible ally.  If it is 
truly who he claims to be, me and my fully Decepticon compatriots will be 
joining him and leaving the Neo Decepticons in the hands of someone else."

Vehement spoke up now.  "What?  There are only five or so non-Decepticons 
here now.  How will that be a group?"

Unicron gave Vehement a stern look.  "Because, Hell Beast and his minions are 
not here."

"Oh." Vehement said, his face showing an expression of understanding at this. 
 "My apologies, Chaos-Bringer."

Unicron no longer gave any notice and turned to Shockwave once more.  "We 
will slowly be pulling our influence out of the NDE so you may rule it in an 
undisputed manner."

"I do not believe it is necessary.  But if you wish to do so, it is your 
choice."

"Ah.  I was worried you were jealous of the Brotherhood's somewhat strong 
influence."

"I feel no emotions."

"Ah.  Well, I shall leave Sun Crusher and Reflector here to aid in anything 
needed.  The rest of us shall return to Rana Kao and work on our own duties."

"Very well." Shockwave said, and after the Brotherhood had left Shockwave 
turned to Firestarter.  "I suggest we begin talks of the base."
